amendment.description: To reduce spending and decrease the risk of drastic energy price increases by prohibiting further greenhouse gas regulations for the purposes of addressing climate change.

vote.text: Amendment SA 359 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 76.

action.text: Amendment SA 359 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Inhofe.
